page.title: 05Travel in Coddenham Area
page.content: A family-owned, independent business, provides public transport with local bus services which for some years have covered a large area of East Suffolk. The main service through Coddenham and Hemingstone, operates between Debenham and Ipswich at two hourly intervals, Monday to Saturday between 0700 and 1830 hrs. The service uses single-deck buses. Single fare Coddenham to Ipswich 55p. Hemingstone to Ipswich 50p Main line Railway Station and National Coaches at Ipswich, 6 miles away with regular services to London and Norwich. For continental travellers, Felixstowe and Harwich Ports are each 20 miles away. Norwich, Southend and Stanstead airports are within reach for air travellers. For daily travel to places of work, for leisure and town shopping, a large percentage of local residents own cars
